name: topojson
description: An extension to GeoJSON that encodes topology.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node rollup.node
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/topojson.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o dist/topojson.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cp -v README.md LICENSE.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js ../topojson-bower && cd ../topojson-bower && git add README.md LICENSE.md topojson.js topojson.min.js && git commit -m "${npm_package_version}" && git tag -am "${npm_package_version}" v${npm_package_version} && git push && git push --tags && cd - && cp dist/topojson.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v3.js && cp dist/topojson.min.js ../d3.github.com/topojson.v3.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add topojson.v3.js topojson.v3.min.js && git commit -m "topojson ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/topojson.zip -- LICENSE.md README.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js
